Entry.JapaneseText: バルカに戻って来たんだネ。
ああ……久しぶりに戻ってくると、 懐かしいものだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed... Coming back after so long sure brings back memories.

Entry.JapaneseText: 覚えてる？ バルカを出発した時のコト？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you remember? When we left Balka?

Entry.JapaneseText: ついて行こうとしたボクに、 <Eugene>はダメだって言ったよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: You told me that I couldn't come with even though I was determined to go with you, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、それでもおまえは 勝手について来ると言って、聞かなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, but even then you didn't heed that, and told me you were going to come along whether I liked it or not.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつの間にか、一緒に旅する事に なじんでしまったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Before I knew it, I had gotten used to travelling together with you.
